H0.text: Which actor played the second Dr Who. William Hartnell

H1.text: Which actor played the second Dr Who. Jon Pertwee

H2.text: Which actor played the second Dr Who. Tom Baker

H3.text: Which actor played the second Dr Who. Pat Troughton

A4.text: In 1969, shortly before leaving the series, producer Peter Bryant cast Pertwee as the Third Doctor in Doctor Who.

A5.text: He played Charlie Sterling in the comedy film Will Any Gentleman...? (1953), which also featured future First Doctor actor William Hartnell playing Inspector Martin.

A6.text: In 1972â€“73's The Three Doctors, William Hartnell and Patrick Troughton returned alongside Jon Pertwee.
